website_summaries.verdict: Despite their low price tag, these teeth whitening strips pay off with near-professional results.
pros: A top choice for its ability to effectively remove years of tough stains in a relatively short period of time
Strips are easy to apply and do a good job covering teeth
cons: Some users complain of increased tooth sensitivity and pain following the first few uses

customer_reviews.title: Look at the photos for the proof.
customer_reviews.text: These strips have been a godsend to me. There's no gum or enamel damage. It's recommended to only do two of them per year. I've kept them on for an hour every night and they've completely changed my teeth!
customer_reviews.author: Chris V

customer_reviews.title: Bad batch or new, useless formula?
customer_reviews.text: I have to agree with the other reviewers here; I've used these for years and they've done wonders but this latest batch have proven useless. I'll try one more order and post an update definitively stating whether the last batch was a bad one or Crest has changed their formula, rendering them useless. Stay tuned.
customer_reviews.author: Amahuna

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR SENSITIVE TEETH
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly effective for an at-home product but...NOT FOR SENSITIVE TEETH. If you have sensitive teeth, be very careful when using this product and don't use it for the recommended amount of time. I used it once a week, every week, and I was still in pain the next day. At one point the pain was so bad (my teeth were unusually sensitive that day), I could barely sleep the night I applied the strips. I ended up switching to their sensitive product, because the agony wasn't worth the efficiency.
customer_reviews.author: Marlena KubotaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Still a great product!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used these for probably 10 years but was noticing my teeth weren't as white as they used to be. They still work like a charm but stick a lot harder to your teeth now! Top is before pic, bottom is after. Taken in the same light. Definitely a noticeable difference!
customer_reviews.author: Lucky girl

customer_reviews.title: RIP OFF.
customer_reviews.text: 1. Causes tooth sensitivity and does not include a remineralization gel like more affordable products on Amazon do 2. Absolutely overpriced for one ingredient. You know what that ingredient is? Hydrogen peroxide. Yeah, you read that right. There are so many more affordable options on Amazon for gels so you can actually whiten your teeth on a frequent basis without breaking the bank. It should be a crime to charge this much. I'd avoid wasting your money on this and go buy something that has the same ingredients and delivers more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: 50+ year old heavy coffee drinker. While I always took care of my teeth, I began to get a little self conscious about noticeable discoloration. Bought a box of these almost on a lark and gave it a try. Results have been incredible. I won't be doing commercials, but I am estimating my teeth are 50% whiter - and very obvious when I open my mouth. Am now on a once-a-week "maintenance" program and brushing 2x daily with the Crest applicable tooth paste. PS - they are easily applied and wearable anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Steelbeach

customer_reviews.title: Crest professional white strips defective and I can’t return them per your website.
customer_reviews.text: The product is defective... I have use creast professional white strips for years the package I just received on Friday the 22nd of 2019... defective..The lower strips are so thick they don’t even stay on your mouth... I tried to put return on my order and your website tells me I can’t...Now I can’t return them and I feel like I just lost $39... Please help me to get the correct product that’s not deaf active!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Package says NOT for individual sale and not sealed
customer_reviews.text: Just received the order and on the front of the package is a huge red label that says this package is not intended for individual sale. Tried calling the 1-800 number listed on the warning label to call if you received this as an individual box - but will have to call back on Monday when Crest offices are open. Definitely does not seem right and I don’t like that the package is not sealed as every other package of white strips I have purchased was. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Jb910

customer_reviews.title: DUDS
customer_reviews.text: I have been using white strips for years. Something is wrong with this latest batch, I keep using them and there is barely any change. Not that I'm complaining, but my teeth aren't the least big sensitive after using them. THAT is really unusual. I think I got a batch of duds....but I keep trying, I am wearing some now!
customer_reviews.author: Green Leaf

customer_reviews.title: Actually Works!
customer_reviews.text: I was so hesitant to buy this at first, but after seeing everyone's "success stories" in the photos, I went for it, and I'm glad I did! Like everyone else said, I could notice a difference after just a few days of using it, and now my teeth are so much brighter and whiter! I actually started wearing darker lipsticks again, since the contrast between that and my teeth is that much better (nothing dingier-looking than red lipstick and yellow teeth...). There definitely was some sensitivity issues later on, so I just began using them on alternate days instead of every day. I've already recommended these to my friends and family!
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: Teeth hurt for weeks, not ADA (American Dental Association) accepted.
customer_reviews.text: Beware: Teeth whitening products are sold as cosmetic products, so in the USA that means they are not tested for safety. My dentist recommends only buying products that are ADA (American Dental Association) accepted because at least then they have to go through some safety testing.
customer_reviews.author: B. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Whitestrips are godsent
customer_reviews.text: Crest has done a great job with their line of whitening strip products. Growing up, I was always criticized by family members for having yellow teeth, which made me self-conscious; however, when I saw this product used by a YouTuber I decided to try it out. Within DAYS of use (1 per day for ~1 week), my teeth were VERY CLEARLY whiter. I've been using this product for over 2 years, gradually less and less frequently (from one a day to once a month, and now only once every 3-4 months for maintenance). I've never been more confident about my teeth, especially how much more affordable it is relative to professional whitening at a dentist office. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Works, but causes some sensitivity in the gums.
customer_reviews.text: I used this product a couple years ago and I forgot why I stopped using it after a whole treatment. It WILL work, your teeth are gonna look very white, specially in photos with good lighting, however it does cause some sensitivity in the gums. It has a total of 20 treatments; two strips for every treatment, for a total of 40 strips.
customer_reviews.author: Héctor

customer_reviews.title: They truly work
customer_reviews.text: I was actually surprised by the results, this is only two strips about 4 days apart. Ive had extremely sensitive teeth for years from steroids (prednisone) and I used sensodyne for quite some time and it's truly helped so I didnt want to ruin all my hard work with teeth whitening but so far after two strips, they are still fine! They whiten pretty well. I use the strips, glamorous whitening toothpaste and mouth wash with them.
customer_reviews.author: ArielJennifer

customer_reviews.title: These are the good ones
customer_reviews.text: These are the good ones. I find there are several varieties of these - Crest and generic. The cheap generic ones are very thick and yucky. Crest used to have these for less but then they came out with other flimsy ones that are really slippery and not fun to have on and those took over that price point and they made these more expensive. But these are the ones. Just the right thickness, stay on, not yucky and work. Had to give last ones away. Writing this so I remember. Crest - you could put on sale every now and then.
customer_reviews.author: KatinaR

customer_reviews.title: Whitens in Splotches
customer_reviews.text: The problem I didn't realize when I bought these is that they only whiten the spots they touch. So if you have even somewhat crooked teeth, this probably isn't the thing for you. They aren't super hard to use (although they do stick together some times when you peel them off the strip). But they're straight forward to use, and convenient. Just in my opinion I'd rather get something that reaches the cracks and crevices in my teeth as well.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: I have excellent oral hygiene
customer_reviews.text: These things do make your teeth white, but take note that they might make your teeth very sore afterward! I have never had sensitive teeth; I have excellent oral hygiene; no cavities, gingivitis, or other anomalies; however, after using these strips for the first couple times (for the appropriate duration and interval as specified on the box), my teeth were so sore I could barely eat food or drink water! Heck, the wind passing over my teeth as I talked hurt excruciatingly bad! I stopped using the product and the soreness subsided after a couple days. So, I suppose there is a tradeoff... they make your teeth white, but at a painful price
customer_reviews.author: A.M.

customer_reviews.title: Works for someone with sensitive teeth
customer_reviews.text: I've used a few different Crest whitening strips and although they work quite well, they made my teeth super sensitive to the point where I can't eat or drink anything that is not at room temperature. I decided to give 3D White a shot since a lot of people have said it works for them even with sensitive teeth. I've been using them for about a week now and no issues with sensitivity and I noticed that my teeth are a few shades whiter. Although it'll take a lot longer than the typical one week treatment, I'm happy with the result so far and no teeth sensitivity, yay!
customer_reviews.author: Catheriya

customer_reviews.title: Some strips don’t have all gel on them! Know what you’re paying for
customer_reviews.text: Bought last year in October but only got to using them in the last month. Two stars because the ones that work, worked well. However I noticed at least 5 out of the 20 treatments did not have gel uniformly on the strip (see picture). If you used this, you would get spots on your teeth! I knew not to use them, but if someone did the results would have been terrible! Also, just to keep in mind if you end up purchasing, you’re only really paying for 15 instead of 20 treatments. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Product is no good.
customer_reviews.text: The whitening agent is not working--at all. Product may be very old. Not sure. But, I am a regular user of white strips and this particular package is worthless. I am so disappointed I spent money on this one. So, I will in the future be very careful about which (of a million whitening strip brand extensions) I buy. Can't return via Amazon, so will now need to just buy at retail so I know package is not beyond expiration date and can return if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY! FAKE STRIPS NO GEL
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTELY DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT! first off it came with 20 strips and not 40. Second when I peeled them off, it had no gel or whitening in any form so just got the strips with nothing on them. Very disappointed. Please save yourself the hassle
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but might need to stretch it out if you have sensitive teeth
customer_reviews.text: Definitely did their job, although I would say I have a high pain tolerance and don't have sensitive teeth and about half way through, I needed to take a break and do them every other day for a while. I've been using Crest Whitestrips since they first came out years ago, probably once every couple of years, and I love them. I got a ton of compliments on how bright my smile was after this set, so I'd definitely recommend it. It doesn't take the full 20 days to get your teeth white either, so you can use them and save the rest for the next round!
customer_reviews.author: akballer

customer_reviews.title: work, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I took pictures before, 1/2 way thru and at the end with a white paper next ot teeth and worked. My dentist she has used in past also and thougth results good. No sensitivity on my teeth but that is luck I think. Tip of my tongue and inside of lip did get sl numb - hydrogen peroxide instrips I think. Took 2-6 days to get back to normal. I took a day or too break when that was happening. Notice instructions- don't brush right before applying but I need to brush afterwards to get the glue of the strip off- comes off easy.
customer_reviews.author: DebbyLA

customer_reviews.title: FOLLOW THE DIRECTIONS AND YOU WON'T BE DISAPPOINTED!  😆😆
customer_reviews.text: Love these SOOO much! I've used them all, like them all, but this particular one is the non-slip type & they are awesome! I use them every 6 months & I get complimes on my white teeth & smile every day! They are a little pricey.... But so EFFECTIVE! Definitely recommend. Btw, use them as directed and don't skip a day. It really makes a huge difference if you don't use them correctly. Every day (for 10 days) and no less than 30 minutes. If you're on the fence and all your teeth are real, BUY THEM! You won't be disappointed!😆
customer_reviews.author: ~michelle~

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: I have used these whitestrips on and off for a few years now. They really work! The key is being consistent as it is not a permanent fix. Do not use them more often than a few times a year. They do not cause any enamel or teeth damage from what I have seen, my dentist even commended me on taking care of my teeth so well. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Dove Family

customer_reviews.title: half the strips don't peel off
customer_reviews.text: I normally like these Crest whitening strips. but this box had a big problem. Half of the strips did not peel off the backing. Instead the backing came off still intact on the strip. But you couldn't see it. When you try to install the strip, it won't stick to your teeth because the backing is still on. So you take it out and discover the problem and try to peel the backing off which is VERY difficult and time consuming. I called CREST but they wouldn't honor the satisfaction guarantee because I bought it from a third party thru Amazon. Very frustrating! Beware!
customer_reviews.author: Flight Jacket

customer_reviews.title: Works! Only been 4 days but already notice a ...
customer_reviews.text: Works! Only been 4 days but already notice a difference in my teeth color! Top pic is my teeth on 05/27/2016, the day I started the strips, and the bottom is 4 days later, 05/31/2016.
customer_reviews.author: Catt

customer_reviews.title: I would highly recommend this product if you want to dramatically whiten your ...
customer_reviews.text: I had tried the activated charcoal and the baking soda to try and whiten my teeth but they both only removed surface stains. I noticed that my teeth whitened dramatically within the first few uses. I did notice extreme sensitivity on my bottom teeth, so I cut the whitening strips in half so that they don't touch the sensitive parts. I would highly recommend this product if you want to dramatically whiten your teeth. I will be buying this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Works but made my teeth hurt/very sensitive
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how well these worked. I had very yellow teath. With just a few days my teeth where alot Whittier. The only downside is it made my teeth very sensitive. I only do it maybe four days max and I would have to stop cause my teeth hurt too bad. But within those days my teeth where white enough for me. And now I have a bunch more when I feel they need a clean again.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Landry

customer_reviews.title: Best Whitestrips I've Ever Used!
customer_reviews.text: These Whitestrips are AMAZING! I have always had very sensitive teeth and until now, I have never been able to leave any whitening strips on for the recommended length of time. I switched to Sensodyne Whitening Toothpaste about a week prior to using the first strip and I also dap some of the toothpaste on my teeth and let it sit for about 20 mins before rinsing and applying the strips. Also, I don't place the strips on my gums. My teeth are visibly whiter and I'm thrilled that I can FINALLY whiten at home.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: If you drink dark liquids like coffee, tea
customer_reviews.text: I did notice a pleasant whitening effect over the course of using this product; I used it mostly twice a day (some days I would skip a second application) until it was gone. If I need to whiten again, I'll be buying another box. It's also been a while since I used them, but I imagine not drinking anything other than water plays a factor in that. If you drink dark liquids like coffee, tea, or soda, the results may not last as long.
customer_reviews.author: Pam. T

customer_reviews.title: I would really recommend making sure to firmly press them onto your teeth
customer_reviews.text: After reading a bunch of reviews, I purchased these strips. They really did make a difference on the color of my teeth. I didn't experience any sensitivity when using them and had no issues. I would really recommend making sure to firmly press them onto your teeth. The first couple of days of use I don't think I pressed them firmly enough. I probably could have made a more sizeable difference if I had done so. But I will be purchasing these again for another treatment once the year period has passed where it's okay to do so again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They Definitely Worked For Me
customer_reviews.text: I used these strips for a total of 14 days, followed the directions exactly, and was pleased to see a marked improvement in the whiteness of my teeth. I stopped after 14 days, because I was beginning to notice an increased sensitivity to heat and cold on my teeth. I plan to wait a month and then re-start the strips again until I finish the box. There was no gum irritation or any other side effects, and I am very pleased with the appearance of my teeth.
customer_reviews.author: K. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Great product, bad for sensitive teeth.
customer_reviews.text: I think that the strips work just fine, especially when trying to whiten your teeth last minute. However, the chemicals are really intense and I only used them twice because my teeth hurt for about 6 hours after using them. If you already have sensitive teeth, don't use them, they will ruin the rest of your day for sure...I was literally crying because my teeth hurt so bad, even after rubbing numbing gel all over my mouth. If you don't have sensitive teeth (like my husband) then give this product a try, they worked great for my hubby.
customer_reviews.author: NG115

customer_reviews.title: Winning!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a daily coffee drinker and this has taken stains off immediately, no need for in office bleaching at dental offices...was actually quite surprised to read so many negative reviews of this product. I was pretty skeptical about purchasing them at first due to the price. Needless to say, I was very satisfied and these are well worth the money! I did not experience any issues with them sliding off, and by day 5 I noticed a big change in the whiteness of my teeth!! There was a bit of sensitivity from them but I used the Sensodyne toothpaste while using and that helped tremendously. I will definitely be purchasing these again!
customer_reviews.author: Lynda M.

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me...
customer_reviews.text: Only worked for a while right after using the strips. No long lasting effect. My teeth weren't super yellow but I wanted them to be whiter. I did not have any pain when using though, no discomfort. Congrats and those of whom it did work.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando A. Chacon

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings
customer_reviews.text: Mixed feelings about these whitestrips. They for sure do work because I get a lot of compliments on how white my teeth are and questions about what product I use. However, occasionally my teeth feels really sensitive, like a sting from my teeth that shoots all the way up to my brain. Sometimes I notice that it will even happen even when I'm not wearing the whitestrips. This did not happen at all before I started whitening. This does not always happen p, but when it does I usually wait a couple days before starting again.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: They don't work, or at least the don't work for everyone.
customer_reviews.text: They didn't whiten my teeth at all or it's hardly noticeable. The photos on here where people have bright white teeth must be shopped or they just don't work for everyone. Just buy toothpaste with baking soda.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Yep, it works!
customer_reviews.text: While in the dentist office getting my teeth cleaned, I asked him how much it would cost to whiten my teeth and he rec commend this product. So happy I listened to him because IT WORKS! I'm a coffee drinker and after using 3 strips, I could already see the big difference. Most important, I have a sensitive gum and it didn't hurt!
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: So far, I have used about 10 strips and ...
customer_reviews.text: So far, I have used about 10 strips and have noticed my teeth are somewhat whiter. I definitely see a difference. The only complaint I have is that it does cause some slight sensitivity in a few of my teeth, I already have sensitive teeth but have noticed after each use more than normal sensitivity so I try to space out each use more and use only every 2-3 days rather than daily. I will update my review after using 20 strips.
customer_reviews.author: miranda

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I've used it for several years, on and off. I find it to be very easy to use and very effective at getting those coffee, etc. stains off the enamel of my teeth. They've innovated significantly from 5-8 years ago, when you could taste the whitening mixture and the strips didn't really hold steady on the teeth. Not - neither of these issues exist.
customer_reviews.author: AnietZ

customer_reviews.title: Really Works!
customer_reviews.text: I already use Crest's 3-D toothpaste, so I wasn't sure how well these Whitestrips would perform. What I found was that my teeth lightened a few more shades. But the real bonus is that the stubborn yellowness near the gum line is just about gone. Overall, my teeth really look so much better; lighter, brighter, whiter. I can see why Crest suggests not only the toothpaste and the mouthwash should be used together, but that, the Whitestrips complete the job. I'm sold!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Beverly

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: These strips work great! They are easy to apply, stay in place, and are comfortable to wear. For me results are easily noticeable on the second day of use. After a week, my teeth are nice and white. One issue I will point out is they may cause some annoying tooth pain. It wasn't bad enough for me to stop using this product because the results are near perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: 3d crest white strips actually work - they actually whiten my teeth it was just a little difficult to get on my bottom teeth. be careful that you don’t use them too many times because they can hurt your teeth (i have sensitive teeth and i just used them too many times - the pain went away after less than a day)
customer_reviews.author: Julie Kornfeld

customer_reviews.title: Do not order
customer_reviews.text: I did not receive the package as pictured. My box says not for individual sale. Looks like someone bought a larger package and broke it down and resold then....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best affordable whitening treatment that works in weeks!
customer_reviews.text: I have used these white strips when I was in college, and my teeth got super sensitive from it. Now, over 10 years later, I wanted whiter teeth for my sister's wedding in Hawaii. The label says enamel safe, and I feel that my teeth did not get any more sensitive from it. However, I already have sensitive teeth ( can not bite into ice cream ). 20 treatments- They work!!! My teeth did not turn insanely white like a paper, so don't compare your teeth to paper, you'll be dissappointed. But many shades less yellow! My fiance is so jealous of my pearls in pictures!! A tip for daily coffee drinkers, drink with a straw.
customer_reviews.author: Anh M

customer_reviews.title: results even after a few uses
customer_reviews.text: I've only used these for a couple days and my teeth are already so much whiter. I have been experiencing teeth and gum sensitivity also so I try to do these every other day. It can also temporarily turn your gums white which is crazy but I'm glad they don't ruin teeth enamel that sets it apart from other teeth whitening products.
customer_reviews.author: Boyonce

customer_reviews.title: easy to use and place
customer_reviews.text: These performed very well. They whitened my teeth at least one shade, maybe 1.5, and got rid of a lot of the yellow at the gum line. Truth to tell, they really didn't do much more after the first ten treatments, so I stopped using them after twelve treatments and will save the other 8 treatments for touch up. I had no sensitivity with these, and they stick very well to the surface of the teeth. Not particularly nasty tasting, easy to use and place, you can talk comfortably with them on. For what they are, inexpensive in-home treatments, I was very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Ouch.  Would sandpaper work better?
customer_reviews.text: Ouch. A few years back I tried the Crest White Strips, and they made my teeth so sensitive that I started using Sensodyne toothpaste. After reading the reviews recently, it seemed that they had improved, and that sensitivity was less of an issue. I'm not so sure that's the case. They definitely stick better than the older ones. After having them on just twice for 30 minutes, and immediately brushing with Sensodyne afterwards, my teeth still hurt the next morning. They look a little whiter after even those two sessions, but unless you're a beauty queen or TV star, I'm not sure that it's worth the pain if your teeth become sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: HomesByScot

customer_reviews.title: 😨😨😨😨😨
customer_reviews.text: Wow are these different than they used to be! So hard to get off i was scared to use them again! Really don't like them and wish they had left them the way they were. Will have to find something else. These are scary!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely thrilled with the results!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely thrilled with the results! I used these daily for 20 days as directed and saw a great difference. I got the results that I was expecting and will definitely use this product again. Of note: After the first use, I was careful not to let the strip touch the metal filling on one side. The sensitivity was shocking! No problems aside from that. The photo with the pink top is my very happy "after" photo.
customer_reviews.author: C. Harris

customer_reviews.title: whitening not as visible as I'd like it, causes temporary sensitivity and pain
customer_reviews.text: They stick to your teeth a lot and leave residue, whitening not as visible as I'd like it, causes temporary sensitivity and pain, doesn't cover enough teeth, etc. Much better to get custom retainers done once and use whitening gel in those.
customer_reviews.author: Matija H.

customer_reviews.title: would recommend using this
customer_reviews.text: These absolutely work from my experience. The only issues that ever really occurred was the increase sensitivity on teeth but was well worth it. My smile is lovely. It definitely will whiten the surface of your teeth however it will not affect the gaps in between your teeth at least when I did them. If your looking to whiten your teeth, would recommend using this.
customer_reviews.author: Oodama Rasengan

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME PRODUCT!!
customer_reviews.text: These strips are fantastic! I noticed a difference after Day 3. While I used the box, I drank dark liquids from straws (coffee, wine, etc) to give it that much more. I got so many compliments on my white teeth just after the first few days. I finished the month supply about a month ago, (and have reverted back to drinking dark liquids without straws) but my teeth are still super white. I'll definitely do these again when my whiteness starts to dull down!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Not great whitening power, more sensitivity than usual
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Crest whitening strips for years. I don't know if I've just reached my whitening saturation or what, but I don't notice a dramatic difference in color when I'm using these. Also, this formulation has caused me major sensitivity that I didn't have from Crest whitening strips in the past. I actually have to use a toothpaste against sensitivity in the days before and after I plan to whiten. I'm going to use this box up and then probably get a different formula. I'm torn though, because I want something more effective than this since I'm not getting the results I want, but the sensitivity is really painful. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Mey

customer_reviews.title: Some lower strips is not sticky
customer_reviews.text: One thing I’m not very satisfy with this product is that 1 in 5-6 lower strips is not sticky at all and it’s impossible to put it on. Once awhile I can only use the upper strip. The whitening effect is great. It doesn’t have a strong chemical taste. In terms of sensitivity, I only felt a severe pain on the first two day. It’s just the lower strip that bothers me.
customer_reviews.author: Benson Ye

customer_reviews.title: Really helped
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job. But only do it twice a week or it hurts
customer_reviews.author: issa secret 🤫

customer_reviews.title: Annoying & slips around on teeth, but decent results
customer_reviews.text: These are incredibly annoying to use. When putting the strips on, touching the inside of your mouth makes it water, which makes them not cling to your teeth as well. I've started laying in bed after putting them on so spit doesn't gather in the front of my mouth, because when you're wearing these, you can't spit or you risk them coming off and the gel getting all in your mouth. I'm 1/2 way through my 20 treatments and the results have been okay. I'll update my review with before and after pictures when all 20 treatments have been used.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: I always hated using these
customer_reviews.text: I always hated using these, but I wasn't using them correctly. Always make sure your gums aren't touching the strips and NEVER BRUSH YOUR TEETH IMMEDIATELY BEFORE USING THEM. Your teeth will hurt so much, trust me. Brush your teeth like 90 minutes before. Also don't use it for longer than 30 minutes even if you think it will work better, it won't. You don't even have to brush your teeth afterwards, I don't. I use it when I'm going to go to sleep at night (but I take it out before I fall asleep of course).
customer_reviews.author: Pascal

customer_reviews.title: Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I used probably only half of the pack because my bf started using them. My teeth definitely got white after only 5-6 uses and I did not use these consistently. I probably used the 5-6 strips over a period of a month and a half. I will be repurchasing. Worth it for them pearly whites!
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Works decently, but not brilliantly.  Did not bother my sensitive teeth.
customer_reviews.text: Works decently well. There was definitely an improvement in whiteness, but it did not result in a glamorous white. Still might need to go to a dentist for that. Also, these strips do not cover all of your teeth, to the front will be white, but the back will not see improvement. I have sensitive teeth, and these strips did not aggravate that. My teeth would sometimes ache just a bit overnight after using these, but that would go away after a day or two. Overall, a decent product that gives tangible (although not brilliant) results.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great product, highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Wow, what a product. I don't know what the other people are complaining about, I had no gum irritation at all, they stayed in place easily and are comfortable and they whitened my teeth by several shades in only 8 applications. I am a coffee drinker and that is the source of my stains and I have a tooth implant in the front so I need to keep my natural teeth a similar shade as the implant. These strips are fast acting and effective and with no discomfort at all I was able to bring my natural teeth to the same shade as my implant and now i have the remaining strips for occasional maintenance whitening. Great product, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: ilmod

customer_reviews.title: whiter teeth!
customer_reviews.text: These really do work. I did experience some sensitivity so I did not use them every day consecutively, and I still got great results. I liked that they really adhered to my teeth, unlike the old crest strips I've used in the past. I could actually talk with these on and I wasn't constantly fixing them to stay on straight. I typically used them 3 days a week and would keep them on my teeth on my way to work so it really wasn't taking up time in my day where it would be inconvenient. When I feel like I need them again, I will definitely use these.
customer_reviews.author: Miss meliss

customer_reviews.title: Listing only for Crest Whitestrip packaging, no actual Whitestrips included
customer_reviews.text: Listing is apparently not for a package of 40 Crest Whitestrips, rather merely the cardboard packaging for such. Ultimately my mistake of course as I did not read seller's fine print but listing is only for the cardboard box and does not include any Crest Whitestrips.
customer_reviews.author: Loren H.

customer_reviews.title: Do the job!
customer_reviews.text: This product actually do the job, make your teeth looks white and prettier. However, it make my teeth feel sour when I chew on food after using immediately, I normally wait a few hours before eating, the sour feeling will go away.
customer_reviews.author: Guinea piggies

customer_reviews.title: SO SO SO GOOD!!
customer_reviews.text: SO SO SO GOOD!!! If you have used Crest 3D Vivid White and you HATE how they always slip around on you, order these! They are like duct tape - which may sound weird, but I can wear these for an hour while talking on the phone and they stay perfectly still. Plus, I saw a difference in 2 weeks (instead of 2 months with Vivid White)
customer_reviews.author: Cheri M.

customer_reviews.title: Work and consistent packaging
customer_reviews.text: I have tried lots of other whitening products on Amazon, and I keep coming back to these. They just consistently work and it appears to last at least several months with regular brushing using whitening toothpaste. I don't experience any sensitivity after using any more either. I did at first but only the first two treatments.
customer_reviews.author: amazontg112

customer_reviews.title: Actually works
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely skeptical that these would work but they do! My teeth weren't too bad; they weren't stained, just a little drab. I'm fifty. They were just... drab. After five sessions/days, my wife noticed a difference. I got a little carried away and did two treatments in one day and my teeth felt sensitive for a day or so afterwards. Other than that, it wasn't noticeable. Someone else recommended Sensodyne toothpaste. I think that helps. My wife, however, tried them and she was bothered by sensitive teeth. Once she used the Sensodyne, she was fine, too. It's pretty cool having white white white teeth.
customer_reviews.author: A Guy From Burbank

customer_reviews.title: Greattttt
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh these are so much better than any I've used!!! I have soft enamel and these don't make my teeth super sensitive or anything. (I'm also using sensodyne while doing these and haven't had problems) I've only done these for 3 nights and that's all I need... But if I wanna go more white I still have 17 days.. It's amazing I saw a difference on the first night people complimented my teeth before so AFTER these amazing strips, lets see how much more people compliment them! Bottom line. Highly recommend and the price is a lot better I subscribed and saved a few pennies.. You can always cancel later on! ;)
customer_reviews.author: Beciscool

customer_reviews.title: Look Professionally Whitened :D
customer_reviews.text: Many people thought i got my teeth whitened professionally after using these strips. I strongly recommend them because they're a reasonable price and will leave your teeth looking super clean. & after reading a few of the comments on Amazon, it's pretty clear that there are people who still feel dissatisfied with their teeth. Be sure to use these as instructed for best results :D
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela

customer_reviews.title: Chipped my teeth- do not buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Used this product exactly as directed, and after pullin off the strips one night, I noticed a piece of one of my top front teeth was missing. I know have to get the tooth professionally filled. When I looked online, I found that many other people had had the exact same thing happen to them. Do NOT buy these - the minimal results are not worth the danger of your teeth disintegrating.
customer_reviews.author: Kasia P.

customer_reviews.title: Did a pretty good job for the price!
customer_reviews.text: These have done a pretty good job. I was worried because I have sensitive teeth and when using whitestrips in the past I would get shooting nerve pain. I did not experience any issues with these whitestrips! They have gotten my teeth whiter but not as white as I'd like. I think I will get another box of these and do a second round.
customer_reviews.author: RoxyBo

customer_reviews.title: but it didn't seem as good as the other ones
customer_reviews.text: These definitely work, but I think the more powerful ones that you leave on for 2 hours, for seven days, might be stronger. I used them years ago and was impressed. This time, I got these instead and they worked, but it didn't seem as good as the other ones. Crest sent me a second box and after using them too, I felt like that brought me to where the other ones did. The directions say you can use these twice a day, for half as many days, which is what I did.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S.

customer_reviews.title: Not What I Ordered
customer_reviews.text: The outside of the box I received looked nothing like the picture advertising this product - first the note in the corner that it last 12 months or more is missing. On the back of the box I received it states that for full results use entire kit - up to 2 kits per year. I'm keeping the strips because I need them - but this is false advertising.
customer_reviews.author: NEAL VAN FOSSAN

customer_reviews.title: Great whitener
customer_reviews.text: Can make your teeth ache if your enamel is thin.
customer_reviews.author: grandma

customer_reviews.title: They whiten but may cause teeth sensitivity
customer_reviews.text: These work very well for whitening however they do cause some teeth sensitivity. Felt random tooth pains even hours after the treatment was completed. For reference I have whitened my teeth in the past with Crest 3D strips and use sensodine toothpaste for the enamel benefits
customer_reviews.author: TheOriginalAlexa

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: These don't work. Didn't notice any difference. Better off using charcoal powder/toothpaste to whiten your teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: I love Crest Whitesetrips and have been using them for years
customer_reviews.text: Within three days my teeth are already whiter. I love Crest Whitesetrips and have been using them for years. These are great as they really adhere to your teeth. I can only do them three days on...two days off, otherwise my teeth get too sensitive. I only need one box every 1 year to 1 1/2 years..of course I am not a coffee drinker, but i do drink red wine, which is where most of my stains come from. I havent tried the crest whitestrips that are one level above this, but i honestly don't think it would create that much of a difference for me to pay the extra $10-20 more.
customer_reviews.author: Bri-mel

customer_reviews.title: Passed the tissue test!
customer_reviews.text: These whitening strips really do work! If o hold up a tissue next to my teeth, they are just as white’ it did get a bit of tooth sensitivity so I would suggest wearing these every other day and I always wore mine a bit longer because I felt like it worked better and got my teeth whiter in shorter time overall. About 40-45 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: These really work-much better than the Crest regular whitening strips. I guess they have a higher amount of hydrogen peroxide, or whatever the whitening ingredient is. I read they made other peoples' gums hurt but they didn't really bother mine. They do stick really well to your teeth and make little mess. Highly recommended. Update: They do work great but they did make my gums hurt after using them 3-4 days in a row. Solution: skip a day or two, then continue. I really like the "glue" they put on these since they don't slide around on your teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Hiker/Biker/Climber

customer_reviews.title: Plesently surprised with results of whiter teeth
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased at the results after using these strips. Being a smoker and heavy coffee drinker for years has done a number on my teeth. After using these as directed, I got a comment on how white my teeth looked. That had never happened in my life! I experienced NO sensitivity after using these strips. Except the one time I peeled them off too quickly and harshly, sensitivity went away in a day. So, lesson learned, peel them off gently. I would recommend these to friends
customer_reviews.author: Kaila

customer_reviews.title: Painful! So I hope they work!
customer_reviews.text: If they provide the results I see in the photos, they're definitely worth it. Be mindful that you'll be in excruciating pain when you apply them for the first time. Especially if you have any teeth sensitivity issues. I didn't see any results after the first use, and was in quite a bit of pain. But my mother always told me it hurts to be beautiful. I will give them another chance, but ouch! I wouldn't have bought them if I knew they could cause a sensation like that. It was like getting twenty cavities filled without Novocaine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I loved it
customer_reviews.text: I have seriously sensitive teeth and gums, and this didn't hurt one bit. Sure, it made my teeth a little sensitive that following night, but that only means that they were just more.. Present in the moment, that was the feeling, if that makes sense.. Anyway, it was very simple and easy to use, super fast, sticks beautifully and stays put, and I think it has already made a difference, but it could definitely be the placebo effect. I am very, very pleased. I highly recommend it, even to those with sensitivities. This one's great for me, and I had 2-3 gum grafts, so.. Go for it, really.
customer_reviews.author: Em G

customer_reviews.title: Been using for almost a decade, still great results!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product twice a year since 2006 with consistently excellent results. I regularly receive compliments on how white my teeth are from my dentist & complete strangers alike. The results are especially noticeable in lighting scenarios with a cooler color temperature, such as in daylight or when lit by a camera flash. They can cause some tooth discomfort during the first couple days of the cycle for me (even a shooting pain from time to time), but your results may vary based on your tooth sensitivity. But the results make it worth it - make sure to stick it out and finish the whole pack!
customer_reviews.author: Shane Stever

customer_reviews.title: Love these and they stick so well to your teeth
customer_reviews.text: Love these and they stick so well to your teeth! I will forever get the professional ones because of how well they stick and dont slip off your teeth
customer_reviews.author: ElizabethAnn

customer_reviews.title: and I am excited to see what they will look like after our final day
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I are currently about half-way through these strips. We have been using (from our own pack) strips every day for 30 minutes a day. So far, we can't complain about a thing! We haven't had any teeth sensitivity, and already see a change in the color of our teeth; my husbands' especially. His teeth were a bit more stained than mine (coffee, wine, genes), and his are already turning much whiter! I am very impressed, and I am excited to see what they will look like after our final day. p.s. these adhere tightly to your teeth. It isn't hard to talk while wearing these, and they don't taste or smell like anything.
customer_reviews.author: Bean & PeanutTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Best teeth whitening strips
customer_reviews.text: All I have to say is short and sweet...THESE THINGS WORK! After only two uses, my teeth are several shades lighter. I cannot wait to see the end result! I don't believe there is any reason to go out and spend money at a dentist or on an expensive teeth whitening system because these have proven themselves to work on myself and my friends who recommended them to me. GET THEM!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Tapp

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a fantastic price.
customer_reviews.text: These strips work as well as the professional whitener that my dentist recommended, and with no stinging or tooth pain. They are easy to apply. But tip: if you don't want yellow to stay in the grooves between your teeth make sure you press them firmly on your teeth when you apply them. And for best results, do not drink liquids while they're on! Substantial difference for a reasonable price when on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Dani R.

customer_reviews.title: Great results!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these for a week or so and the results have been amazing. I noticed whiter teeth after the first use and the results have only gotten better. I am an avid coffee drinker and so my teeth were getting a bit yellowed. Since I don't have the extra 500 for a professional clean I chose this reasonably priced option and have been satisfied so far. A few things to note: 1. Will cause minor sensitivity after use. Not too bad as others have reported. 2. May irritate gums if you floss prior to use. Other than that it is a great product with great results. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: David Levine

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I used Crest Whitestrips (and only Crest Whitestrips) 2 or 3 years ago and still receive compliments about how white my teeth are. I never drink coffee, but I do drink chai about 3-5 times a week, so I have been pretty impressed with how well the Whitestrips worked originally and how long the effects lasted. They do cause some sensitivity, and very rarely sting while they are on, but the discomfort is temporary. (It's probably worth noting that I had braces for 4 years so I have become pretty patient with tooth discomfort and am able to overlook it when I know that the long term results will be worth it.)
customer_reviews.author: K. Zarn

customer_reviews.title: My Teeth Hurt but...
customer_reviews.text: These hurt my teeth. I only wore them for 20 minutes and my teeth hurt for a day. Not as bad as some I've tried, it was at least tolerable and I could still drink cold water and hot food. I did like the feel of them and how easy they were to put on and how they stayed in place, you can actually talk with these on.. In reading the other reviews I guess I will keep using and try gargling with hydrogen peroxide. Maybe this will help. IM HOPEFUL.
customer_reviews.author: MurphyTheMenace

customer_reviews.title: These are great! I see real results
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I see real results. I used to be smoker so I had some teeth significantly yellowe than the others and these evened out the color and they are overall wither! I always dreamed of getting a professional whitening and now for 50$ I don't need it anymore. I did experience some gum irritation but after a day of pause it was gone. Also, I suggest that you put a tiny corner of napkin to cover the gum that you don't want to touch the strip and it will not get irritated.
customer_reviews.author: Ale F

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t switch these for anything in the world! I used them x1-2 a year for the last 5 years and many people even strangers compliment me on my white teeth. But I also try to avoid teas and coffee and if I drink these I limit them and try to drink with a straw
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These work great
customer_reviews.text: It is a noticeable differnce after about a week (for me). It just has to be part of a routine every morning and at times the inconvenience of leaving it on for 20 minutes or more as you are trying to have your morning tea or coffee or breakfast is cumbersome. You can also do it any other time of the day, but once I got home, again was too busy for "me time". Don't do what I tried to do and wear them all night. Oooh weee. Your teeth may become super sensitive for a couple of days. Silly decision on my part, but when else are you not sipping water or eating lunch and dinner? Anyway, they work.
customer_reviews.author: D. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: I have used two treatments now and am extremely pleased with the results
customer_reviews.text: I have used two treatments now and am extremely pleased with the results. These are easy to place, hold pretty well, and do the job they are intended to do. It is slightly uncomfortable but I have experienced no sensitivity and it is only a half hour treatment so you don't need to keep them on too long. Make sure to really force the strips into the cracks of your teeth and along your gumline so the white looks natural.
customer_reviews.author: Reed

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: To whiten teeth. Use them three times a week. Work great!
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Great but the seal is very "advanced"
customer_reviews.text: The whitening strips are working really well - I am seeing results faster than when I have used Crest White Strips in the past (their products offered years ago). They don't slip at all when I am wearing them and I find that I end up inadvertantly swallowing MUCH LESS of the whitening agent because they stick so well. My only complaint (and it's a very small one) is that when it's time to remove the strips, you really have to PULL them off. The sealer that they use to make the strips not slip while you're wearing them, leaves a thick and funcky residue. But hey, it's nothing that a good teeth-brushing won't get rid of!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie C.

customer_reviews.title: My Orthodontist was impressed
customer_reviews.text: When I have gone to the dentist for cleaning the last couple visits after using the Crest Professional Strips my Orthodontist has commented on how white my teeth are and asked if I used a whitener. I only need to use them a couple days and the stains go away and my teeth look great so I don't usually do the full 7 days. I also leave them on for an hour instead of 1/2 hour. The instructions say if you do not experience any sensitivity you can do this. Use these instead of the less expensive Crest whiteners because you actually save money due to how effective they are.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Great firmness in mouth!!!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT STUFF SO FAR! I am amazed at the difference in the adherence of these strips compared to the,older ones. They stay on tightly, do not move, nor do they leak the bleach stuff into you mouth. Easy to keep in for an hour without feeling uncomfortable! Great improvement!!! I will write more after I have used them longer. Then I will be able to review if they actually lightened my teeth. More to come!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: On the road to whiter teeth!
customer_reviews.text: Auro Glow LED light with these strips works wonders. My daughter and I both use the two for great results.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

product_meta.title: Crest 3D White Professional Effects Whitestrips Teeth Whitening Strips Kit
feature_bullets: Safe on enamel using the same whitening ingredient as dentists
Advanced Seal Technology’s no slip grip stays put so you can talk and drink water while whitening teeth
20 teeth whitening strip treatments, each with 1 upper and 1 lower strip, Apply once a day for 30 minutes
